title: Save Smarter, Not Harder | How To Stick With Your Financial Plan
itunes:title: Save Smarter, Not Harder | How To Stick With Your Financial Plan
description:
Creating a financial plan and making a habit to fulfill it is easier said than done. In this last episode of our Radical Middle series, it is all about sticking to your financial plan based on the dream life you envisioned! We unravel how psychology, our financial decisions, and willpower are all intertwined components to help us recognize ourselves such as our capabilities in saving smarter.Â
